specific_issues.description:
L-HHS-ED and T-HUD Appropriations for FY 2017: all provisions dealing with human services and employment for people with disabilities and Social Security Administration Limitation on Administrative Expenses (LAE), transportation, housing, and voting. President's 2017 budget request, House FY 2017 Budget Resolution.
Discussions relating to block grants, deficit reduction, Balanced Budget Amendment, employment initiatives, Social Security disability issues, and automatic enforcement mechanisms.
Funding for HUD's Section 811 Supportive Housing for Person with Disabilities Program in FY 2017, the CDC's National Center on Birth Defects and Developmental Disabilities.
Preservation of the Social Services Block Grant; H.R. 4724, "Reducing Duplicative and Ineffective Federal Funding Act"
